name: AvoCoMangoBan Smoothie
description: Indulge in a refreshing and nutritious AvoCoMangoBan Smoothie, perfectly blending the creamy textures of avocado and banana with the tropical sweetness of mango and coconut. Ideal for those following a low-sodium, high-fiber diet, this healthified recipe promises not only a burst of flavors but also a boost of wellness. Satisfy your cravings while keeping it healthy!

recipeInstructions.text: Scoop out the avocado flesh and chop the mango into chunks.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add banana slices, avocado flesh, mango chunks, shredded coconut meat, water, whipped cream, and Stevia to a blender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Blend on high speed until smooth, about 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Pour into glasses and serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
